name: For You I'll become a Hero
name_original: For You I'll become a Hero
description:
Introduction

For You I'll become a Hero was made for Brackeys Game Jam #2. It is a story-based Jump and Run Platformer about changing yourself for love to overcome time and rescue your dear friend.

Controls

WASD - Move

SPACE - Jump (Doublejump unlockable)

LEFT SHIFT - Run 

LMB - Interact (also indicated ingame)

RMB - Dash (unlockable)

ESC - Pause Game

Credits Nils 'Frame'Marco 'Metrax'Art
